parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Max number of devices to return in the result-set.
If not set, it will be treated as 0, and the response will only return the total_count.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset in the result-set (for pagination).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: If set, the given string will be used to search on name (optional).

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID (UUID) to filter devices on.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Application ID (UUID) to filter devices on.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description:
Asset Type to filter devices on.

 - ASSET_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_TYPE_WATER_METER: AMR Water meter Inductive.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ENERGY_METER: Energy Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GAS_METER: GAS Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GPS_TRACKER: GPS Tracker device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device.

parameters.name: assetSubType
parameters.description:
Asset Sub Type to filter devices on.

 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_ODU: Outdoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI ODU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_IDU: Indoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI IDU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_AIL_V1: ADARKO Inductive Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_CPI_V1: CPI Inductive Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_PULSE_AIL_V1: ADARKO Pulse Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_MAGNETIC_AIL_V1: ADARKO Magnetic Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_GAS_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_GAIL_V1: Gail Gas Meter  AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_ENERGY_METER_ELM_3PH_V1: Elmeasure 3hpase enagy Meter  AMR - V1

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description:
Device type to filter devices on.

 - DEVICE_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_DEVICE: LoRaWAN device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM: Cellular MQTT device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_LTE: Cellular TCP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM_LTE: Cellular UDP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY: LoRaWAN Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_WMBUS_C_MODE_END_DEVICE: Wmbus C Mode End Device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_WMBUS_C_MODE_HHU_GATEWAY_DEVICE: Wmbus C Mode HHU Gateway Device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_WMBUS_C_MODE_DUAL_END_DEVICE: LoRaWAN WMBUS C Mode Dual End Device type.

parameters.name: transportProtocol
parameters.description:
- TRANSPORT_PROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: Unknown protocol.
 - TRANSPORT_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN.
 - TRANSPORT_WMBUS_C_MODE: Wireless M-Bus C Mode.
 - TRANSPORT_HTTP: HTTP/HTTPS over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_MQTT: MQTT over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_TCP: TCP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_UDP: UDP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_COAP: CoAP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_WEBSOCKET: WebSocket.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: If set, the given value will be used to sort by (optional).

parameters.name: orderByDesc
parameters.description: If set, the sorting direction will be decending (default = ascending) (optional).

get.summary: GetDevicesSummary returns an aggregated summary of the devices (online,offline,never seen based DeviceType, TransportProtocol, AssetType, AssetSubType , tenantid, applicationid).

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Application ID (UUID) to filter devices on.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Tenant ID (UUID) to filter devices on.

parameters.description:
Device Type.

 - DEVICE_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_DEVICE: LoRaWAN device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM: Cellular MQTT device type.

parameters.description:

 - ASSET_TYPE_WATER_METER: AMR Water meter Inductive.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ENERGY_METER: Energy Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GAS_METER: GAS Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GPS_TRACKER: GPS Tracker device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device.

 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_ODU: Outdoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI ODU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_IDU: Indoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI IDU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_AIL_V1: ADARKO Inductive Water Meter AMR - V1

 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_MAGNETIC_AIL_V1: ADARKO Magnetic Water Meter AMR - V1

Device Transport Protocol.

 - TRANSPORT_PROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: Unknown protocol.
 - TRANSPORT_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN.

 - TRANSPORT_HTTP: HTTP/HTTPS over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).

parameters.description: ID.

parameters.description: EUI (EUI64).

platformAssetSubType.description:
- ASSET_SUB_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_ODU: Outdoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI ODU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY_CPI_IDU: Indoor LoRaWAN Gateway - CPI IDU
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_AIL_V1: ADARKO Inductive Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_CPI_V1: CPI Inductive Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_PULSE_AIL_V1: ADARKO Pulse Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_AMR_MAGNETIC_AIL_V1: ADARKO Magnetic Water Meter AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_GAS_METER_AMR_INDUCTIVE_GAIL_V1: Gail Gas Meter  AMR - V1
 - ASSET_SUB_TYPE_ENERGY_METER_ELM_3PH_V1: Elmeasure 3hpase enagy Meter  AMR - V1
platformAssetSubType.title:
Asset sub-type enumeration.
AssetSubType defines specific sub-types for various asset categories. which will help for UI representation, filtering, data decode etc.
it will be manufacturer and model specific.
Ex : ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_INDUCTIVE_mfr_model = ASSET_SUB_TYPE_WATER_METER_INDUCTIVE_AIL_V1
DO NOT CHANGE THE EXISTING VALUES, APPEND NEW VALUES AT THE END TO AVOID CONFLICTS

platformAssetType.description:
- ASSET_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_TYPE_WATER_METER: AMR Water meter Inductive.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ENERGY_METER: Energy Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GAS_METER: GAS Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GPS_TRACKER: GPS Tracker device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device.

variables.description:
Variables (user defined).
These variables can be used together with integrations to store tokens /
secrets that must be configured per device. These variables are not
exposed in the event payloads.

tags.description:
Tags (user defined).
These tags can be used to add additional information to the device.
These tags are exposed in all the integration events.

parentDeviceId.title: Parent Device ID in case of isParentDevice=false;

data.description: Processed data (JSON string containing decoded sensor readings).

platformDeviceType.description:
Communication mode enumeration - unified for inventory and other services.

 - DEVICE_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_DEVICE: LoRaWAN device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM: Cellular MQTT device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_LTE: Cellular TCP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM_LTE: Cellular UDP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY: LoRaWAN Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_WMBUS_C_MODE_END_DEVICE: Wmbus C Mode End Device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_WMBUS_C_MODE_HHU_GATEWAY_DEVICE: Wmbus C Mode HHU Gateway Device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_WMBUS_C_MODE_DUAL_END_DEVICE: LoRaWAN WMBUS C Mode Dual End Device type.

platformLocationSource.description:
Location source enumeration - unified across all services.

 - LOCATION_SOURCE_UNKNOWN: Unknown location source.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GPS: GPS coordinates.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL: Manually configured.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_TRIANGULATION: Calculated via triangulation.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_WIFI: WiFi-based location.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL_OVERRIDE: Manual override.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_CONFIG: Configuration-based.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_TDOA: GEO resolver TDOA.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_RSSI: GEO resolver RSSI.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_GNSS: GEO resolver GNSS.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_WIFI: GEO resolver WiFi.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_MOBILE_GPS: GEO resolver MOBILE GPS.

platformTransportProtocol.description:
Transport protocol enumeration - unified for inventory and data services.

 - TRANSPORT_PROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: Unknown protocol.
 - TRANSPORT_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN.
 - TRANSPORT_WMBUS_C_MODE: Wireless M-Bus C Mode.
 - TRANSPORT_HTTP: HTTP/HTTPS over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_MQTT: MQTT over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_TCP: TCP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_UDP: UDP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_COAP: CoAP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_WEBSOCKET: WebSocket.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
